boons.name: Divine Strike
boons.description: Your Attack is stronger, and can Deflect.

boons.name: Divine Flourish
boons.description: Your Special is stronger, and can Deflect.

boons.name: Phalanx Shot
boons.description: Your Cast damages foes in a small area, and can Deflect.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Damage Radius: 250
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf

boons.name: Phalanx Flare
boons.description: Your Cast damages foes around you, and can Deflect.

boons.name: Divine Dash
boons.description: Your Dash deals damage and can Deflect.

boons.name: Athena's Aid
boons.description: Your Call briefly makes you Invulnerable and Deflect all attacks.

rarity.common:
Effect Duration: 1.5 Sec.
Max Gauge Bonus: x6 Duration

boons.name: Holy Shield
boons.description: After you take damage, damage nearby foes and briefly Deflect.

boons.name: Bronze Skin
boons.description: Resist damage from foes' attacks.

boons.name: Sure Footing
boons.description: Resist damage from Traps.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Allows the player to walk in Asphodel's magma without taking damage for a short amount of time.
  • Does not protect against puddles of magma created by fireballs.
  • This boon cannot be upgraded via poms.

boons.name: Proud Bearing
boons.description: You begin each Encounter with your God Gauge partly full.
boons.prerequisites: Aphrodite's Aid, Ares' Aid, Artemis' Aid, Athena's Aid, Demeter's Aid, Dionysus' Aid, Poseidon's Aid, or Zeus' Aid

boons.name: Blinding Flash
boons.description: Your abilities that can Deflect also make foes Exposed for 5 Sec.
boons.prerequisites: Divine Strike, Phalanx Shot, Divine Dash, or Divine Flourish

boons.name: Brilliant Riposte
boons.description: When you Deflect attacks, they deal more damage.
boons.prerequisites: Divine Strike, Divine Dash, Holy Shield, or Divine Flourish

boons.name: Deathless Stand
boons.description: Death Defiance makes you Impervious longer. Replenish 1 charge now.

boons.name: Last Stand
boons.description: Death Defiance restores more than usual. Replenish 1 charge now.

boons.name: Divine Protection
boons.description:
You have a barrier that negates incoming damage.
  • Barrier Cooldown: 20 Sec.
boons.notes:
Tier 3
  • Attacks that are successfully blocked do not remove the barrier.

boons.name: Parting Shot
boons.description:
Your Cast gains any bonuses you have for striking foes from behind.
  • Bonus Backstab Damage: +25%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Athena: Divine Strike, Phalanx Shot, Divine Flourish, Divine Dash, or Athena's Aid
  • Aphrodite: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, Heartbreak Flourish, or Aphrodite's Aid

boons.name: Merciful End
boons.description:
Your attacks that can Deflect immediately activate Doom effects.
  • Doom Combo Damage: 40
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Athena: Divine Strike, or Divine Flourish
  • Ares: Curse of Agony or Curse of Pain

boons.name: Deadly Reversal
boons.description:
After you Deflect, briefly gain +20% chance to deal Critical damage.
  • Critical Duration: 2 Sec.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Athena: Divine Strike, or Divine Flourish
  • Artemis: Deadly Strike, Deadly Flourish, True Shot, or Artemis' Aid

boons.name: Stubborn Roots
boons.description:
While you have no Death/Stubborn Defiance your slowly recovers.
  • Life Regeneration: 1 (every 0.8 Sec.)
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Athena: Divine Strike, Divine Flourish, Phalanx Shot, Divine Dash, or Athena's Aid
  • Demeter: Frost Strike, Mistral Dash, Frost Flourish, Crystal Beam, or Demeter's Aid

boons.name: Calculated Risk
boons.description:
Your foes' ranged-attack projectiles are slower.
  • Foe Projectile Speed Reduction: +50%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Athena: Divine Strike, Divine Flourish, Divine Dash, or Athena's Aid
  • Dionysus: Drunken Strike, Drunken Flourish, Drunken Dash, or Dionysus' Aid

boons.name: Unshakable Mettle
boons.description:
You cannot be stunned, and resist some damage from Bosses.
  • Boss Damage Reduction: +10%
boons.notes: Bosses include the Furies, the Bone Hydra, the Heroes of Elysium, the Secret Boss, and Final Boss.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Athena: Divine Strike, Divine Flourish, Phalanx Shot, Divine Dash, or Athena's Aid
  • Poseidon: Tempest Strike, Tidal Dash, Tempest Flourish, Flood Shot, or Poseidon's Aid

boons.name: Lightning Phalanx
boons.description:
Your Phalanx Shot Cast bounces between nearby foes.
  • Max Bounces: 5
boons.notes: * Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Athena: Phalanx Shot
  • Zeus: Lightning Strike, Thunder Flourish, Thunder Dash, or Zeus' Aid

curse.name: exposed
curse.description: For 5 Seconds, victim takes more damage when struck from behind.
